page.title: 19Hatfield Broad Oak's Future
page.content: It is very difficult to predict the effect which the expected expansion of Stansted Airport will have on this area of quiet countryside. The farmer whom we interviewed foresaw possible problems caused by the much increased number of people who would be working and living in the area immediately surrounding the airport. Proximity to towns unfortunately seems to mean an increased incidence of minor acts of vandalism, and farming routine has to be adapted to guard against this. Again, although the area has been designated as part of London's 'green belt' there will inevitably be more building, even if this is restricted as at present to 'filling in'. It is our fervent hope that the development which takes place will enhance and preserve rather than destroy the peace and beauty of this ancient village.
